SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.tui

Class Printer.Canvas

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.tui.Printer.Canvas
Enclosing class:
Printer
public static class Printer.Canvas extends Object
Canvas allows to handles dynamic matrices of characters. It simplifies the process of "drawing" using characters. Single characters can also have a color, if colors are enabled.

  • Method Details

    • setTextColor

      public void setTextColor(Printer.TextColor color)
      Selects the current colors. Only works if colors are enabled.
      Parameters:
      color - TextColor that needs to be used for the next added characters

    • resetColor

      public void resetColor()
      Resets the currently selected color to WHITE

    • putChar

      public void putChar(char c, int x, int y)
      Puts a single char on the canvas at a specified location
      Parameters:
      c - character that needs to be added
      x - the horizontal coordinate of the cell that needs to be updated
      y - the vertical (top to bottom) coordinate of the cell that needs to be updated

    • putString

      public void putString(String string, int x, int y)
      Puts a string on the canvas starting at a specified location
      Parameters:
      string - string that needs to be added
      x - the horizontal coordinate of the cell where the first character of the string need to be put
      y - the line where the string needs to be put

    • putStringMatrix

      public void putStringMatrix(String[] strings, int x, int y)
      Puts a matrix of characters on the canvas starting at a specified location
      Parameters:
      strings - array of strings that defines the matrix of characters
      x - the horizontal coordinate of the cell where the first character of the matrix need to be put
      y - the vertical coordinate of the cell where the first character of the matrix need to be put

    • putCanvas

      public void putCanvas(Printer.Canvas canvas, int x, int y)
      Puts a canvas on the current one starting at a specified location
      Parameters:
      canvas - canvas that needs to be put on the current canvas
      x - the horizontal coordinate of the cell where the first character of the canvas need to be put
      y - the vertical coordinate of the cell where the first character of the canvas need to be put

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Allows to retrieve a printable version of the Canvas.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the string representing the canvas
